resources.string:
First field "Enter tile" - Enter a title or name so that you can distinguish the cards. 

Second field "Enter phone number" - Enter the number to which you want to set auto reply by tags. 

Third field "Enter tags" - Enter a comma separated list of tags that will trigger autoreply. For example, enter the tag: "shop" and the reply to this tag: "I'm busy, sorry". If you receive a message, for example "Dear go to the shop" followed by an auto-reply "I'm busy, sorry". 

Fourth field "Enter reply" - Enter the reply that will be sent if one of the tags has coincided.
